name: DEEPCAMBRIA
description:
2D exploratory shooting action!

Game Video

Story：

In the year 2XXX, the Earth has become uninhabitable.

Humans scattered across the universe in search of a habitable planet.

In the midst of this, a girl found a planet where everything was an ocean.

The planet is Cambria, and rumor has it that there is a "resting place" deep in a deep sea cave.

To get there, the girl became a diver and jumped into the deep sea...

Operation Method:   WASD / Move 

 ESC/close 

 F11/resize screen ;

 Right mouse click/fire gun 

 R/gun reload

Description:   This is a deep-sea cave exploration type shooting game in which you have to defeat various deep-sea creatures and ancient creatures from the Cambrian period. In this game, you will have to use your gun to defeat a variety of deep-sea creatures and ancient creatures from the Cambrian period. The levels of the deep-sea caves are described as "depths", and the ancient creature bosses are waiting for you deep in the vast levels. There are a large number of guns and items available, and you can interact with your friends in the village, have adventures, and challenge yourself through the Lv system. There is also a breathing element, and if you run out of oxygen, the game is over... Developer's Twitter：

@hayadebi
